arn.description: Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the DLM Lifecycle Policy.

description.description: A description for the DLM lifecycle policy.

executionRoleArn.description: The ARN of an IAM role that is able to be assumed by the DLM service.

policyDetails.description: See the `policy_details` configuration block. Max of 1.

state.description: Whether the lifecycle policy should be enabled or disabled. `ENABLED` or `DISABLED` are valid values. Defaults to `ENABLED`.

tags.description: Key-value map of resource tags. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

tagsAll.description: A map of tags assigned to the resource, including those inherited from the provider `default_tags` configuration block.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering LifecyclePolicy resources.
